title: cant sign in
body:
i restarted my password three times because everytime i try to login it says invalid name or password. yet i am able to log in on the browser account. 
has this happened to anyone else?
i restarted my password again which i got an email to confirm my password change and still i can log into my client. 
am i doing anything wrong? is league down for today?

replies.body: Checking your region would have been my first suggestion as well.   If you're on NA and having issues still, hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Our account team can help with any recovery issues, so don't worry.  We'll reply back asap!

i have gone through the account recovery and filled out a form.
a day later i received am email for a password reset and i am still having the same problems. I'm switching back to the legacy client to see if i can log in to there

Swapping between client versions won't be able to restore access to your account, but our account recovery team can help.  If you have a ticket number, I'd be happy to check on your status.  Otherwise, hang tight as we review your specific case and get back to you!
i am logging into the proper server
